text: Martin L. Brandtner (3 July 1938 - 3 January 2017) was an American Marine Corps lieutenant general. He served as the Director for Operations for the Joint Staff until his retirement on 1 June 1993. Brandtner died on 3 January 2017, at the age of 78, in Reno, Nevada. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2017 deaths Category:United States Marine Corps personnel Category:People from Minneapolis
title: Martin Brandtner
